LEIAuthorityID.description: Whenever the LEI authority is a participating peer, its platform ID (optional)

LEIAuthorityPK.description: The public encryption key of the authority, used to verify signatures

LEIType.description: The nature of the legal entity. We do not constrain the string here due to multiple regulatory frameworks and therefore defer the verification of a suitable legal entity type to an agreement workflow. None refers to funds which are not materialized by a legal entity (e.g. mandates).

LEICode.description: The LEI code provided by the LEI authority

LEICodeValidityPeriod.description: Validity period for this LEI code attribution

RegisteredLEI.description: A Legal Entity Identifier description, with registration information

LEIAuthoritySeal.description: A signature generated by the LEI authority to seal the description
